Biomass_share: Share of de-central biomass on final energy demand for space heating and domestic hot water prep-aration_base year_2017

Share_whith_baseyear_demand_2050: Ratio of bio-mass re-source po-tential 2050 on biomass utilization in base year_2050_assumption
